name: Going Upstream
description:
Let's paddle a canoe and climb up the river as far as we can! It's a simple game of just climbing up the river.

Use boosts and lateral movements skillfully to avoid obstacles and aim upstream. If you fail, you'll be swept down the river to a lower point.

Plan ahead and progress smartly!

Objective of This Game


This game is about a mysterious old man who relentlessly climbs up the river. Aim to reach the goal as quickly as possible!

How to Play


The controls are very simple! Use AWSD or the arrow keys to move left and right to avoid obstacles.
You can dash by pressing upwards.
